content: **need a new go-to baby blanket in your repertoire ** try the cluster stitch baby blanket this blanket is beginner-friendly and works up quickly use the pastel shades of teal and pink shown or pull from your stash to build your own gorgeous palette **pattern highlights** // learn the double_crochet cluster stitch - it s easy and provides beautiful texture // make it all in one color or use an array of colors // instructions provided to make this blanket any size you want **size** 32 x 40 with instructions to make this in any size you want **suggested yarn** any worsted weight yarn **hooks used** j 10/6mm & i 9/5 5 crochet hooks
